body.p:
To His Excellency B. Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned members of the Hickman County Bar, learning that the Hon. R K. Williams our present circuit Judge will probably resign his office as said Judge, in which event., we recommned to your Excellency the appointment of George W Silvertooth Esqr to that position. untill an election can be held by the people

E S Ballard
Ed Crossland
S C O Citlar
R. W. Walker
W. Lindsay
Jno, M, Brummal
W D. Lannon
E R Ray
F McKay
W, R, Bradley
